properties.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued February 16 at 2:31PM MST until February 17 at 11:00AM MST by NWS Missoula MT
properties.description:
* WHAT...Snow expected. Total snow accumulations of 2 to 4 inches,
lesser amounts around Butte. Brief bursts of heavy snow will
lead to highly variable road conditions and sudden reductions in
visibility. Wind gust to 35 mph may lead to some drifting of
snow through early evening.

* WHERE...Butte, Georgetown Lake, Highway 12 Garrison to
Elliston, Homestake Pass, and MacDonald Pass.

* WHEN...Until 11 AM MST Monday.

* IMPACTS...Travel could be affected.
properties.instruction:
Slow down and use caution while traveling.

The latest road conditions for the state you are calling from can
be obtained by calling 5 1 1.

NWSheadline: WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY IN EFFECT UNTIL 11 AM MST MONDAY
